mapper.insert: insert into XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL( CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, DESCRIPTION, SEQ, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, REMITTANCETYPE, STATUS, MONEY, AUDITPEOPLE, RMBMANUAL_ID ) values ( #{CREATEDATETIME}, #{UPDATEDATETIME}, #{CREATEUSER}, #{UPDATEUSER}, #{KEYWORD}, #{DESCRIPTION}, #{SEQ}, #{LOGINNAME}, #{USERNICKNAME}, #{USERREALNAME}, #{REMITTANCETYPE}, #{STATUS}, #{MONEY}, #{AUDITPEOPLE}, #{RMBMANUAL_ID} )
mapper.update: update XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL set DESCRIPTION = #{DESCRIPTION}, LOGINNAME = #{LOGINNAME}, REMITTANCETYPE = #{REMITTANCETYPE}, MONEY = #{MONEY}, RMBMANUAL_ID = RMBMANUAL_ID where RMBMANUAL_ID = #{RMBMANUAL_ID}
mapper.select: select CREATEDATETIME, UPDATEDATETIME, CREATEUSER, UPDATEUSER, KEYWORD, DESCRIPTION, SEQ, LOGINNAME, USERNICKNAME, USERREALNAME, REMITTANCETYPE, STATUS, MONEY, AUDITPEOPLE, RMBMANUAL_ID from XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL where RMBMANUAL_ID = #{RMBMANUAL_ID}

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SEQ, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.REMITTANCETYPE, a.STATUS, a.MONEY, a.AUDITPEOPLE, a.RMBMANUAL_ID from XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL a

select a.CREATEDATETIME, a.UPDATEDATETIME, a.CREATEUSER, a.UPDATEUSER, a.KEYWORD, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SEQ, a.LOGINNAME, a.USERNICKNAME, a.USERREALNAME, a.REMITTANCETYPE, a.STATUS, a.MONEY, a.AUDITPEOPLE, a.RMBMANUAL_ID from XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL a
mapper.delete:
delete from XNHB_MONEY_RMBMANUAL where RMBMANUAL_ID in
#{item}
